description: This table holds the history of the bundled episodes that have been linked to AP claim service lines.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column indicates when the related episode was linked or unlinked from this service line.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column defines which bundled episode is being linked or unlinked on this line.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column defines whether this history line is linking or unlinking the related episode. The categories can be referenced via Clarity table ZC_BND_EPSD_ACTION.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Link


Unlink

columns.name: BND_EPSD_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates how the link or unlink of the related episode was performed, either by a user, by the system, or by configured automation. The categories can be referenced via Clarity table ZC_BND_EPSD_SRC.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: BND_EPSD_USER_ID
columns.description: This column indicates the user who linked or unlinked the episode.
